#include<bits/stdc++.h>
typedef long long int ll;
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ll n,ans=0;
        cin>>n;
        while(n%2==0)
        {
            ans++;
            n=n/2;
        }

        for(int i=3;i<=sqrt(n);i=i+2)
        {
            while(n%i==0)
            {
                ans++;
                n=n/i;
            }
        }
        if(n>2)
            ans++;
        cout<<ans<<endl;
    }
    return 0;

}
